content: Write a sonnet about love with each line beginning with consecutive letters of the alphabet.

Ardent flames within my heart doth burn,
Blazing brightly, love's pure fire returns.
Captivating dreams of you, my soul's delight,
Desires deep and true, in night's soft light.

Eagerly I wait for your gentle touch,
Fearing not the pain that love can clutch.
Glorious moments when we're intertwined,
Holding close, our hearts entwined, enshrined.

Infinite are the ways I cherish you,
Joyful days and nights, our love anew.
Kept safe in my heart, where you reside,
Loving you forever, side by side.

Marvelous is this journey we embark,
Nestled in each other's loving bark.
